methods: abstract PendingResult<DataSourcesResult> findDataSources(GoogleApiClient client, DataSourcesRequest request) Finds all available data sources, on the device and remotely.
abstract PendingResult<Status> register(GoogleApiClient client, SensorRequest request, DataSourceListener listener) Register for real time updates from a sensor data source.
abstract PendingResult<Status> register(GoogleApiClient client, SensorRequest request, PendingIntent intent) Register for real time updates from a sensor data source using a PendingIntent.
abstract PendingResult<Status> unregister(GoogleApiClient client, DataSourceListener listener) Unregister from real-time updates from a sensor data source.
abstract PendingResult<Status> unregister(GoogleApiClient client, PendingIntent pendingIntent) Unregister from updates from a sensor data source with a PendingIntent.
